content.rendered:
New Book Feature: Thirteen Reasons Why

Did you know Gottwals Books also carries new books? We stock new releases and popular titles like Thirteen Reasons Why by Jay Asher. Be sure to read the book before watching the Netflix adaptation in March!

 

Recommended Series: Stephanie Plum Novels

A former department store worker inadvertently becomes a bail bond enforcer in this laugh-out-loud series by Janet Evanovich.

 

New Thinking Putty

We just re-stocked our stores with Crazy Aaron’s Thinking Putty®… this time featuring new colors and effects! Check out the Liquid Glass putty or get bedazzled by the Precious Gems colors.

 

Puzzles with a Twist!

Melissa and Doug® has fun and engaging stacking and balancing puzzles to challenge your child’s motor skills and critical thinking.
